summary: This is an email auto-reply notification from an individual at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, indicating they will be out of the office from August 5-9, 2019, and listing acting contacts. The email also includes a list of maintenance or operational work orders for the facility, such as repairing doors and phones. The document is dated August 9, 2019, which is the same week Jeffrey Epstein died in custody at MCC New York.

persons.name: Acting for me
persons.context: Person designated to act for the email sender on Monday August 5 and Tuesday August 6, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Mr.
persons.context: Person designated to act for the email sender from Wednesday through Friday (August 7-9, 2019) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Staff Out of Office
events.description: The email sender indicates they will be out of the office from Monday, August 5 through Friday, August 9, 2019, with limited phone and email access.

locations.name: MCC-New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, the federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is an email auto-reply dated Friday, August 9, 2019, from someone at MCC New York.
The sender was out of the office the week of August 5-9, 2019, which overlaps with the period of Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody (August 10, 2019).
The email includes a list of facility maintenance issues at MCC New York, such as inoperable doors and phones.
The document originates from the US Department of Justice and is part of the Epstein case document release.
